title: Switch
description: Emma Caine never thought true love would be like this. With the wickedly appealing Simon more than 6000 kilometres away, she's feeling sexually deprived - despite the thriving domination dungeon she runs from her back garden.It's business as usual for Emma and the wealthy slaves who come to her to be tortured and tantalised. But while Simon is burying himself in work, a rival dominatrix thinks Emma is stealing her clients and she's doing her best to put Emma out of business.Emma needs to defeat her competitor, salvage her relationship and deal with a surprise house guest. If the famous Mistress Caine wants her happy ending, she's going to have to rely on more than just her chrome-heeled stiletto boots.
author: Jassy Mackenzie
